adHeader: Balloon Animals & Face Painting By Dream Parties Best Rates in Cali!
adDetails: Don't get duped by having a clown claim they can do it all. We have professional balloon twisters and face painters that will both come to your party and our prices still remain the lowest in the Bay Area, guaranteed! We are professional and exceptional at what we do! $75/ Hour for Face Painting & Body Art $80/Hour for Balloon Animal Guy Let Dream Parties bring the fun for your little ones! Looking for more than just face painting and balloon art at your party?
